mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(max(IMGREFDT) keep (dense_rank last order by IMGREFDT),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as lateststuff FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE Detector=1 and Channel=1 and Name='SNR' AND PID=1 and INSTRUMENTMODE=4

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, VALUE, DETECTOR FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE ImgRef like '${targetDate}%' AND Channel=1 AND Name='SNR' AND Detector IN (0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7) AND PID=1 AND INSTRUMENTMODE=4 ORDER BY dStr, detector

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, max(case when Name = 'RadianceMin' then Value else null end) as Min, max(case when Name = 'RadianceMax' then Value else null end) as Max, max(case when Name = 'RadianceMean' then Value else null end) as Mean, max(case when Name = 'RadianceMedian' then Value else null end) as Median, max(case when Name = 'RadianceSTD' then Value else null end) as STD FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE ImgRef like '${targetDate}%' AND Detector=#{detector} AND Channel=1 AND Name IN ('RadianceMin', 'RadianceMax','RadianceMean','RadianceMedian', 'RadianceSTD') AND PID=1 AND INSTRUMENTMODE=4 and INSTRUMENT='V' GROUP BY IMGREFDT ORDER BY DSTR

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, VALUE ,NAME FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE ImgRef like '${targetDate}%' AND Detector=#{detector} AND Channel=1 AND Name IN ('RadianceMin', 'RadianceMax','RadianceMean','RadianceMedian', 'RadianceSTD') AND PID=1 AND INSTRUMENTMODE=4 and INSTRUMENT='V' ORDER BY dStr, name

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, detector, max(case when TID = 25 then Value else null end) as VALUE FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE ImgRef like '${targetDate}%' AND Detector=${detector} AND PID=1 AND INSTRUMENTMODE=4 AND INSTRUMENT='V' AND Channel=1 AND TID IN (25) GROUP BY IMGREFDT,detector ORDER BY DSTR

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, detector, max(case when TID = 31 then Value else null end) as VALUE FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE ImgRef like '${targetDate}%' AND Detector=${detector} AND INSTRUMENT='I' AND PID=1 AND INSTRUMENTMODE=4 AND Channel=4 AND TID IN (31) GROUP BY IMGREFDT,detector ORDER BY DSTR

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, Channel, max(case when TID = 36 then Value else null end) as VALUE FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE ImgRef like '${targetDate}%' AND Detector = ${detector} AND INSTRUMENT='I' AND PID=1 AND INSTRUMENTMODE=4 AND Channel BETWEEN 2 AND 5 AND TID IN (36) GROUP BY IMGREFDT,Channel ORDER BY DSTR,Channel

SELECT TO_CHAR(ipt.IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, (bag.paramtype) as PID, bag.paramvalue as VALUE, ptype.name as TYPENAME
FROM cpp_radio_param_bag_t bag, cpp_img_product_t ipt, cpp_radio_param_type_t ptype WHERE ipt.id = bag.imageproduct AND bag.paramtype = ptype.id AND imgref LIKE '${targetDate}%' AND bag.paramtype in (7,8,28,30,31) AND ipt.instrumentmode=4 AND bag.channel=4 AND ipt.platform=1 AND detector =${detector} ORDER BY ipt.imgref, PID

SELECT p.imgref , b.paramvalue, c.paramvalue FROM cpp_img_product_t p, CPP_RADIO_PARAM_BAG_T b, CPP_RADIO_PARAM_BAG_T c WHERE imgref LIKE '${targetDate}%' AND b.paramtype=7 and c.paramtype=30 AND p.instrumentmode=4 and p.platform=1 AND b.detector =1 and b.channel=4 AND c.ParamValue < '5000.0' AND c.ParamValue > '-5000.0' AND p.id = b.imageproduct and b.imageproduct = c.imageproduct AND b.CHANNEL = c.CHANNEL AND b.DETECTOR = c.DETECTOR ORDER BY p.imgref

SELECT DISTINCT p.imgref DDDMYD, p.instrumentmode, (Select paramvalue from cpp_radio_param_bag_t T7 where T7.imageproduct = p.id and T7.paramtype=7 and T7.channel=4 and T7.detector=1) as "PTYPE(7)", (Select paramvalue from cpp_radio_param_bag_t T30 where T30.imageproduct = p.id and T30.paramtype=30 and T30.channel=4 and T30.detector=1) as "PTYPE(30)" FROM cpp_img_product_t p WHERE imgref LIKE '${targetDate}%' AND p.instrumentmode=4 AND p.platform=1 ORDER BY p.imgref

SELECT DISTINCT p.imgref DDDMYD, p.instrumentmode, (Select paramvalue from cpp_radio_param_bag_t T8 where T8.imageproduct = p.id and T8.paramtype=8 and T8.channel=4 and T8.detector=1) as "PTYPE(8)", (Select paramvalue from cpp_radio_param_bag_t T28 where T28.imageproduct = p.id and T28.paramtype=28 and T28.channel=4 and T28.detector=1) as "PTYPE(28)" FROM cpp_img_product_t p WHERE imgref LIKE '${targetDate}%' AND p.instrumentmode=4 AND p.platform=1 ORDER BY p.imgref

SELECT DISTINCT p.imgref DDDMYD, p.instrumentmode, (Select paramvalue from cpp_radio_param_bag_t T8 where T8.imageproduct = p.id and T8.paramtype=8 and T8.channel=4 and T8.detector=1) as "PTYPE(8)", (Select paramvalue from cpp_radio_param_bag_t T31 where T31.imageproduct = p.id and T31.paramtype=31 and T31.channel=4 and T31.detector=1) as "PTYPE(31)" FROM cpp_img_product_t p WHERE imgref LIKE '${targetDate}%' AND p.instrumentmode=4 AND p.platform=1 ORDER BY p.imgref
SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, ROIID, COUNT FROM CPP_NAVPERFO_V WHERE imgref LIKE '${targetDate}%' AND IMGMODE = 1 AND RoiID IN (1,2,3,4,5) ORDER BY DSTR, RoiID

SELECT TO_CHAR(IMGREFDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as DSTR, ROIID, AverageEW, AverageNS FROM CPP_NAVPERFO_V WHERE imgref LIKE '${targetDate}%' AND IMGMODE = 1 AND RoiID IN (1,2,3,4,5) ORDER BY DSTR, RoiID
